programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series West continues the rush through the Golden State. Grave Digger’s Adam Anderson brings the series points lead to San Diego. Camden Murphy looks to fly the Dragonoid to its first freestyle win, while Son-Uva Digger’s Ryan Anderson tries for his series leading 4th racing win of the season.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam heads to Minnesota as the battle for the series championship rages on between Bakugan Dragonoid’s Camden Murphy and Grave Digger’s Adam Anderson. New contenders have emerged as Cole Venard tries to lead the Black Pearl to another event win and Mike Christensen looks to take Vendetta to back to back freestyle victories.

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.sub-title: Vivint Arena - Salt Lake City, UT
programme.desc: Arena in 30 returns to The Vivint Arena in Salt Lake City, UT. Reigning Series Champion, Krysten Anderson, tries to lead Grave Digger to the Arena Championship Series West Overall Event Championship. It will be a tough dirt road as she’ll have to surpass superstars like Tristan England, and Elvis Lainez.

programme.title: Primetime
programme.desc: It's Primetime in Detroit as Stadium Championship East continues for Round 14.

programme.title: Arena in 30
programme.desc: Grave Digger’s Weston Anderson brings the Arena Championship Series East points lead to the Fiserv Forum in Milwaukee. El Toro Loco’s Armando Castro looks to drive El Toro Loco to another Overall Event Championship while 2019 World Finals Champion Linsey Read tries to defeat them both.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series East returns to Houston for another carnage-filled round on some of the slickest dirt in the sport. JCB Digitron’s Tristan England looks for his first overall event win of the season, while Tom Meents looks to add to his legacy as the all-time winningest driver at Houston’s NRG Stadium.
